definition: Describing an injection procedure e.g. injection of virus.

description.definition: A textual description of the preparation.
description.value: Injection of virus in medial septum, AAV-mediated expression of channelrhodopsin-2

flow.definition: The angle of the implant, assuming leveled bregma and lambda, 0 degrees is vertical implantation

injection_substance.definition: The full name of the injection substance, e.g. AAV8-hSyn-eChR2(H134R)-EYFP.

injection_substance_information.value: Diluted to 5X10e12  with ice cold PBS (sterile lab PBS

injection_substance_manufacurer.definition: Name of manufacturer of the injection substance.

injection_substance_storage_info.definition: Information of storage procedure of injection substance.
injection_substance_storage_info.value: Kept on ice in fridge during surgery, for 2 h

injection_substance_storage_manufactuer.definition: Manufacturer of storage device for injection substance

location.definition: Describes the brain area of recording. MS: Medial Septum, MECR: Medial Entorhinal Cortex Right hemisphere, MECL: Medial Entorhinal Cortex Left hemisphere,

name: injection_ms

notes.value: 1 minute waiting before injection, 8 minute waiting after

position_reference.definition: By default position are specified by the coordinates of skull. Use this property for other definitions.
